MD4 to Historic Status
contents.zh-CHS: MD4的历史地位

contents.text: Abstract
contents.zh-CHS: 摘要

contents.text: This document retires RFC 1320, which documents the MD4 algorithm, and discusses the reasons for doing so. This document moves RFC 1320 to Historic status.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档取消了RFC1320，它记录了MD4算法，并讨论了这样做的原因。本文件将RFC 1320移至历史状态。

contents.text: 1. Introduction
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 介绍

contents.text: MD4 [MD4] is a message digest algorithm that takes as input a message of arbitrary length and produces as output a 128-bit "fingerprint" or "message digest" of the input. This document retires [MD4]. Specifically, this document moves RFC 1320 [MD4] to Historic status. The reasons for taking this action are discussed.
contents.zh-CHS: MD4[MD4]是一种消息摘要算法，它将任意长度的消息作为输入，并生成输入的128位“指纹”或“消息摘要”作为输出。本文档取消了[MD4]。具体而言，本文件将RFC 1320[MD4]移至历史状态。讨论了采取这一行动的原因。

contents.text: [HASH-Attack] summarizes the use of hashes in many protocols and discusses how attacks against a message digest algorithm's one-way and collision-free properties affect and do not affect Internet protocols. Familiarity with [HASH-Attack] is assumed.
contents.zh-CHS: [哈希攻击]总结了哈希在许多协议中的使用，并讨论了针对消息摘要算法的单向和无冲突属性的攻击如何影响和不影响Internet协议。假设熟悉[哈希攻击]。

contents.text: 2. Rationale
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 根本原因

contents.text: MD4 was published in 1992 as an Informational RFC. Since its publication, MD4 has been under attack [denBORBOS1992] [DOBB1995] [DOBB1996] [GLRW2010] [WLDCY2005] [LUER2008]. In fact, RSA, in 1996, suggested that MD4 should not be used [RSA-AdviceOnMD4]. Microsoft also made similar statements [MS-AdviceOnMD4].
contents.zh-CHS: MD4于1992年作为信息RFC出版。MD4自发布以来一直受到攻击[denBORBOS1992][DOBB1995][DOBB1996][GLRW2010][WLDCY2005][LUER2008]。事实上，RSA在1996年建议不要使用MD4[RSA-AdviceOnMD4]。微软也发表了类似的声明[MS-AdviceOnMD4]。

contents.text: In Section 6, this document discusses attacks against MD4 that indicate use of MD4 is no longer appropriate when collision resistance is required. Section 6 also discusses attacks against MD4's pre-image and second pre-image resistance. Additionally, attacks against MD4 used in message authentication with a shared secret (i.e., HMAC-MD4) are discussed.
contents.zh-CHS: 在第6节中，本文档讨论了针对MD4的攻击，这些攻击表明在需要抗碰撞时使用MD4不再合适。第6节还讨论了针对MD4预映像和第二预映像抵抗的攻击。此外，还讨论了使用共享密钥（即HMAC-MD4）对消息身份验证中使用的MD4的攻击。

contents.text: 3. Documents that Reference RFC 1320
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 参考RFC 1320的文件

contents.text: Use of MD4 has been specified in the following RFCs:
contents.zh-CHS: 以下RFC中规定了MD4的使用：

contents.text: Internet Standard (IS):
contents.zh-CHS: 互联网标准（IS）：

contents.text: o [RFC2289] A One-Time Password System.
contents.zh-CHS: o [RFC2289]一次性密码系统。

contents.text: Draft Standard (DS):
contents.zh-CHS: 标准草案（DS）：

contents.text: o [RFC1629] Guidelines for OSI NSAP Allocation in the Internet.
contents.zh-CHS: o [RFC1629]互联网上OSI NSAP分配指南。

contents.text: Proposed Standard (PS):
contents.zh-CHS: 建议标准（PS）：

contents.text: o [RFC3961] Encryption and Checksum Specifications for Kerberos 5.
contents.zh-CHS: o [RFC3961]Kerberos 5的加密和校验和规范。

contents.text: Best Current Practice (BCP):
contents.zh-CHS: 最佳现行做法（BCP）：

contents.text: o [RFC4086] Randomness Requirements for Security.
contents.zh-CHS: o [RFC4086]安全性的随机性要求。

contents.text: Informational:
contents.zh-CHS: 信息性：

contents.text: o [RFC1760] The S/KEY One-Time Password System.
contents.zh-CHS: o [RFC1760]S/键一次性密码系统。

contents.text: o [RFC1983] Internet Users' Glossary.
contents.zh-CHS: o [RFC1983]互联网用户词汇表。

contents.text: o [RFC2433] Microsoft PPP CHAP Extensions.
contents.zh-CHS: o [RFC2433]Microsoft PPP CHAP扩展。

contents.text: o [RFC2759] Microsoft PPP CHAP Extensions, Version 2.
contents.zh-CHS: o [RFC2759]Microsoft PPP CHAP扩展，第2版。

contents.text: o [RFC3174] US Secure Hash Algorithm 1 (SHA1).
contents.zh-CHS: o [RFC3174]美国安全哈希算法1（SHA1）。

contents.text: o [RFC4757] The RC4-HMAC Kerberos Encryption Types Used by Microsoft Windows.
contents.zh-CHS: o [RFC4757]Microsoft Windows使用的RC4-HMAC Kerberos加密类型。

contents.text: o [RFC5126] CMS Advanced Electronic Signatures (CAdES).
contents.zh-CHS: o [RFC5126]CMS高级电子签名（CAdES）。

contents.text: There are other RFCs that refer to MD2, but they have been either moved to Historic status or obsoleted by a later RFC. References and discussions about these RFCs are omitted. The notable exceptions are:
contents.zh-CHS: 还有其他引用MD2的RFC，但它们要么已被移至历史状态，要么已被后来的RFC淘汰。关于这些RFC的参考和讨论被省略。值得注意的例外是：

contents.text: o [RFC2313] PKCS #1: RSA Encryption Version 1.5.
contents.zh-CHS: o [RFC2313]PKCS#1:RSA加密版本1.5。

contents.text: o [RFC2437] PKCS #1: RSA Cryptography Specifications Version 2.0.
contents.zh-CHS: o [RFC2437]PKCS#1:RSA加密规范2.0版。

contents.text: o [RFC3447] Public-Key Cryptography Standards (PKCS) #1: RSA Cryptography Specifications Version 2.1.
contents.zh-CHS: o [RFC3447]公钥加密标准（PKCS）#1:RSA加密规范版本2.1。

contents.text: 4. Impact of Moving MD4 to Historic
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 将MD4迁移到历史数据库的影响

contents.text: The impact of moving MD4 to Historic is minimal with the one exception of Microsoft's use of MD4 as part of RC4-HMAC in Windows, as described below.
contents.zh-CHS: 将MD4迁移到Historic的影响很小，但有一个例外，即Microsoft在Windows中使用MD4作为RC4-HMAC的一部分，如下所述。

contents.text: Regarding DS, PS, and BCP RFCs:
contents.zh-CHS: 关于DS、PS和BCP RFC：

contents.text: o The initial One-Time Password systems, based on [RFC2289], have ostensibly been replaced by HMAC-based mechanism, as specified in "HOTP: An HMAC-Based One-Time Password Algorithm" [RFC4226]. [RFC4226] suggests following recommendations in [RFC4086] for random input, and in [RFC4086] weaknesses of MD4 are discussed.
contents.zh-CHS: o 最初基于[RFC2289]的一次性密码系统表面上已被基于HMAC的机制所取代，如“HOTP:基于HMAC的一次性密码算法”[RFC4226]所述。[RFC4226]在[RFC4086]中提出了以下关于随机输入的建议，并在[RFC4086]中讨论了MD4的弱点。

contents.text: o MD4 was used in the Inter-Domain Routing Protocol (IDRP); each IDRP message carries a 16-octet hash that is computed by applying the MD-4 algorithm (RFC 1320) to the context of the message itself. Over time, IDRP was replaced by BGP-4 [RFC4271], which required at least [MD5].
contents.zh-CHS: o MD4用于域间路由协议（IDRP）；每个IDRP消息都携带一个16个八位组的散列，该散列是通过将MD-4算法（RFC 1320）应用于消息本身的上下文来计算的。随着时间的推移，IDRP被BGP-4[RFC4271]取代，后者至少需要[MD5]。

contents.text: o Kerberos Version 5 [RFC3961] specifies the use of MD4 for DES encryption types and checksum types. They were specified, never really used, and are in the process of being deprecated by [DES-DIE]. Further, the mandatory-to-implement encrypted types and checksum types specified by Kerberos are based on AES-256 and HMAC-SHA1 [RFC3962].
contents.zh-CHS: o Kerberos版本5[RFC3961]指定将MD4用于DES加密类型和校验和类型。它们是指定的，从未真正使用过，并且正在被[DES-DIE]弃用。此外，实现Kerberos指定的加密类型和校验和类型的强制方法基于AES-256和HMAC-SHA1[RFC3962]。

contents.text: Regarding Informational RFCs:
contents.zh-CHS: 关于信息RFC：

contents.text: o PKCS#1 v1.5 [RFC2313] indicated that there was no reason to not use MD4. PKCS#1 v2.0 [RFC2437] and v2.1 [RFC3447] recommend against MD4 due to cryptoanalytic progress having uncovered weaknesses in the collision resistance of MD4.
contents.zh-CHS: o PKCS#1 v1.5[RFC2313]表示没有理由不使用MD4。PKCS#1 v2.0[RFC2437]和v2.1[RFC3447]建议不要使用MD4，因为密码分析的进展发现了MD4在抗冲突方面的弱点。

contents.text: o Randomness Requirements [RFC4086] does mention MD4, but not in a good way; it explains how the algorithm works and that there have been a number of attacks found against it.
contents.zh-CHS: o 随机性需求[RFC4086]确实提到了MD4，但不是很好；它解释了算法是如何工作的，并且已经发现了许多针对它的攻击。

contents.text: o The "Internet Users' Glossary" [RFC1983] provided a definition for Message Digest and listed MD4 as one example.
contents.zh-CHS: o “Internet用户词汇表”[RFC1983]提供了消息摘要的定义，并将MD4列为一个示例。

contents.text: o The IETF OTP specification [RFC2289] was based on S/KEY technology. So S/KEY was replaced by OTP, at least in theory. Additionally, the S/KEY implementations in the wild have started to use MD5 in lieu of MD4.
contents.zh-CHS: o IETF OTP规范[RFC2289]基于S/KEY技术。因此，S/KEY被OTP取代，至少在理论上是这样。此外，野外的S/KEY实现已经开始使用MD5代替MD4。

contents.text: o The CAdES document [RFC5126] lists MD4 as a hash algorithm, disparages it, and then does not mention it again.
contents.zh-CHS: o CAdES文档[RFC5126]将MD4列为哈希算法，对其进行了贬损，然后不再提及它。

contents.text: o The SHA-1 document [RFC3174] mentions MD4 in the acknowledgements section.
contents.zh-CHS: o SHA-1文件[RFC3174]在确认部分提到了MD4。

contents.text: o The three RFCs describing Microsoft protocols, [RFC2433], [RFC2759], and [RFC4757], are very widely deployed as MS-CHAP v1, MS-CHAP v2, and RC4-HMAC, respectively.
contents.zh-CHS: o 描述Microsoft协议的三个RFC[RFC2433]、[RFC2759]和[RFC4757]分别被广泛部署为MS-CHAP v1、MS-CHAP v2和RC4-HMAC。

contents.text: o MS-CHAP Version 1 is supported in Microsoft's Windows XP, 2000, 98, 95, NT 4.0, NT 3.51, and NT 3.5, but support has been dropped in Vista. MS-CHAP Version 2 is supported in Microsoft's Windows 7, Vista, XP, 2000, 98, 95, and NT 4.0. Both versions of MS-CHAP are also supported by RADIUS [RFC2548] and the Extensible Authentication Protocol (EAP) [RFC5281]. In 2007, [RFC4962] listed MS-CHAP v1 and v2 as flawed and recommended against their use; these incidents were presented as a strong indication for the necessity of built-in crypto-algorithm agility in Authentication, Authorization, and Accounting (AAA) protocols.
contents.zh-CHS: o 微软的Windows XP、2000、98、95、NT 4.0、NT 3.51和NT 3.5都支持MS-CHAP版本1，但Vista已不再支持MS-CHAP版本1。微软的Windows7、Vista、XP、2000、98、95和NT4.0支持MS-CHAP版本2。RADIUS[RFC2548]和可扩展身份验证协议（EAP）[RFC5281]也支持MS-CHAP的两个版本。2007年，[RFC4962]将MS-CHAP v1和v2列为有缺陷的，建议不要使用；这些事件有力地说明了身份验证、授权和计费（AAA）协议中内置加密算法灵活性的必要性。

contents.text: o The RC4-HMAC is supported in Microsoft's Windows 2000 and later versions of Windows for backwards compatibility with Windows 2000. As [RFC4757] stated, RC4-HMAC doesn't rely on the collision resistance property of MD4, but uses it to generate a key from a password, which is then used as input to HMAC-MD5. For an attacker to recover the password from RC4-HMAC, the attacker first needs to recover the key that is used with HMAC-MD5. As noted in [RFC6151], key recovery attacks on HMAC-MD5 are not yet practical.
contents.zh-CHS: o RC4-HMAC在Microsoft的Windows 2000和更高版本的Windows中受支持，以向后兼容Windows 2000。正如[RFC4757]所述，RC4-HMAC不依赖MD4的抗冲突属性，而是使用它从密码生成密钥，然后将其用作HMAC-MD5的输入。为了让攻击者从RC4-HMAC恢复密码，攻击者首先需要恢复HMAC-MD5使用的密钥。如[RFC6151]所述，对HMAC-MD5的密钥恢复攻击还不实用。

contents.text: 5. Other Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 5. 其他考虑

contents.text: rsync [RSYNC], a non-IETF protocol, once specified the use of MD4, but as of version 3.0.0 published in 2008, it has adopted MD5 [MD5].
contents.zh-CHS: rsync[rsync]，一种非IETF协议，曾经指定使用MD4，但从2008年发布的3.0.0版开始，它已经采用了MD5[MD5]。

contents.text: 6. Security Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 6. 安全考虑

contents.text: This section addresses attacks against MD4's collisions, pre-image, and second pre-image resistance. Additionally, attacks against HMAC-MD4 are discussed.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节介绍针对MD4冲突、预映像和第二个预映像阻力的攻击。此外，还讨论了针对HMAC-MD4的攻击。

contents.text: Some may find the guidance for key lengths and algorithm strengths in [SP800-57] and [SP800-131] useful.
contents.zh-CHS: 有些人可能会发现[SP800-57]和[SP800-131]中关于密钥长度和算法强度的指南很有用。

contents.text: 6.1. Collision Resistance
contents.zh-CHS: 6.1. 抗碰撞

contents.text: A practical attack on MD4 was shown by Dobbertin in 1996 with complexity 2^20 of MD4 hash computations [DOBB1996]. In 2004, a more devastating result presented by Xiaoyun Wang showed that the complexity can be reduced to 2^8 of MD4 hash operations. At the Rump Session of Crypto 2004, Wang said that as a matter of fact, finding a collision of MD4 can be accomplished with a pen on a piece of paper. The formal result was presented at EUROCRYPT 2005 in [WLDCY2005].
contents.zh-CHS: Dobbertin在1996年展示了对MD4的实际攻击，MD4哈希计算的复杂性为2^20[DOBB1996]。2004年，王晓云提出的一个更具破坏性的结果表明，MD4哈希操作的复杂度可以降低到2^8。在Crypto 2004的尾声会议上，Wang说，事实上，找到MD4的碰撞可以用一支笔在一张纸上完成。正式结果在[WLDCY2005]的EUROCRYPT 2005上公布。

contents.text: 6.2. Pre-Image and Second Pre-Image Resistance
contents.zh-CHS: 6.2. 预成像和第二预成像电阻

contents.text: The first pre-image attack on full MD4 was accomplished in [LUER2008] with complexity 2^100. Some improvements are shown on pre-image attacks and second pre-image attacks of MD4 with certain pre-computations [GLRW2010], where complexity is reduced to 2^78.4 and 2^69.4 for pre-image and second pre-image, respectively. The pre-image attacks on MD4 are practical. It cannot be used as a one-way function. For example, it must not be used to hash a cryptographic key of 80 bits or longer.
contents.zh-CHS: 第一次针对完整MD4的图像前攻击是在[LUER2008]中完成的，复杂性为2^100。通过某些预计算[GLRW2010]，MD4的预映像攻击和第二预映像攻击得到了一些改进，其中预映像和第二预映像的复杂性分别降低到2^78.4和2^69.4。对MD4的预映像攻击是切实可行的。它不能用作单向函数。例如，它不能用于散列80位或更长的加密密钥。

contents.text: 6.3. HMAC
contents.zh-CHS: 6.3. HMAC

contents.text: The attacks on Hash-based Message Authentication Code (HMAC) algorithms [RFC2104] presented so far can be classified in three types: distinguishing attacks, existential forgery attacks, and key recovery attacks. Of course, among all these attacks, key recovery attacks are the most severe attacks.
contents.zh-CHS: 目前提出的对基于散列的消息认证码（HMAC）算法[RFC2104]的攻击可分为三类：区分攻击、存在伪造攻击和密钥恢复攻击。当然，在所有这些攻击中，密钥恢复攻击是最严重的攻击。

contents.text: The best results on key recovery attacks on HMAC-MD4 were published at EUROCRYPT 2008 with 2^72 queries and 2^77 MD4 computations [WOK2008].
contents.zh-CHS: 关于HMAC-MD4的密钥恢复攻击的最佳结果发表在EUROCRYPT 2008上，其中包含2^72个查询和2^77个MD4计算[WOK2008]。

contents.text: 7. Recommendation
contents.zh-CHS: 7. 正式建议

contents.text: Despite MD4 seeing some deployment on the Internet, this specification obsoletes [MD4] because MD4 is not a reasonable candidate for further standardization and should be deprecated in favor of one or more existing hash algorithms (e.g., SHA-256 [SHS]).
contents.zh-CHS: 尽管MD4在互联网上有一些部署，但该规范淘汰了[MD4]，因为MD4不是进一步标准化的合理候选者，应该反对使用一个或多个现有哈希算法（例如SHA-256[SHS]）。

contents.text: RSA Security considers it appropriate to move the MD4 algorithm to Historic status.
contents.zh-CHS: RSA Security认为将MD4算法移动到历史状态是合适的。

contents.text: It takes a number of years to deploy crypto and it also takes a number of years to withdraw it. Algorithms need to be withdrawn before a catastrophic break is discovered. MD4 is clearly showing signs of weakness, and implementations should strongly consider removing support and migrating to another hash algorithm.
contents.zh-CHS: 部署crypto需要几年时间，撤销crypto也需要几年时间。在发现灾难性中断之前，需要撤销算法。显然，M4显示了弱点，并且实现应该强烈考虑删除支持和迁移到另一个哈希算法。

contents.text: 8. Acknowledgements
contents.zh-CHS: 8. 致谢

contents.text: We'd like to thank RSA for publishing MD4. Obviously, we have to thank all the cryptographers who produced the results we refer to in this document. We'd also like to thank Ran Atkinson, Sue Hares, Sam Hartman, Alfred Hoenes, John Linn, Catherine Meadows, Magnus Nystrom, and Martin Rex for their input.
contents.zh-CHS: 我们要感谢RSA发布MD4。显然，我们必须感谢所有产生我们在本文中提到的结果的密码学家。我们还要感谢Ran Atkinson、Sue Hares、Sam Hartman、Alfred Hoenes、John Linn、Catherine Meadows、Magnus Nystrom和Martin Rex的投入。

contents.zh-CHS: 9. 资料性引用

contents.zh-CHS: [denBORBOS1992]B.den Boer和A.Bosselaers。对MD4最后两轮的攻击。《密码学的进展——加密’91》，第194-203页，Springer Verlag，1992年。

contents.zh-CHS: [DES-DIE]Astrand，L.，“反对DES对Kerberos的支持”，正在进行的工作，2010年7月。

contents.text: [DOBB1995] H. Dobbertin. Alf swindles Ann. CryptoBytes, 1(3): 5, 1995.
contents.zh-CHS: [DOBB1995]H.Dobbertin。阿尔夫骗了安。加密字节，1（3）：51995。
